name: Volatile Fangbinder
description: A rat-like creature grown to the size of a badger by uncontrolled nanite mutation, it has oversized fangs that drip with volatile chemicals. Its fur is patchy and mottled with corroded metal plates, making it look like an armored patchwork doll.
dialogue: Metallic screech, followed by a fizzle
Rattling clatter of corroded bone and metal
Growl that sounds like static electricity

flavor.rationale: Originally engineered to scavenge for metals in the sewers, these Fangbinders were exposed to a concentrated nanite spill during an industrial accident. The volatile chemicals they secrete are now attracting other mutated creatures, creating packs and breeding grounds.
